titleStmt.title: The mysticall match between Christ and his church by the late learned and reverend divine, John Preston ... The leading sermon to that treatise of his called The churches marriage.
titleStmt.author: Preston, John, 1587-1628.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Francis Eaglesfield, and are to be sold at the Marigold ...,

notesStmt.note: "The churches marriage or duty" has separate t.p.
Part 2 has running title: The churches cariage.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
